title: the Living Sun
intro: Ra’sutekh is the Paragon of Sol’zakar, known by many as the Living Sun. Wielding the Sun Staff of Khem, he commands the literal power of the sun to incinerate his foes. Unlike other rulers who hide in the backline, Ra’sutekh stands at the center of his golden empire, forcing enemies to choose between stepping into his searing light or retreating into the shadows of history.

abilities.name: Glorious Radiance
abilities.details: Ra’sutekh gains bonus [bf]cooldown reduction[/] based on the [ap]magical power[/] he possesses.

abilities.name: Searing Beam
abilities.details:
Ra’sutekh fires a concentrated beam of solar energy from his staff in a long line, dealing [ap]magical damage[/] (scaling with [ap]magical power[/]) to all enemies hit.

If the beam passes through an Obelisk, the beam refracts, creating two additional smaller beams that fire at 45-degree angles from the Obelisk, dealing slightly reduced damage.

The refracted beam can be further refracted by multiple Obelisks, dealing the same damage.

abilities.name: Rise of the Obelisk
abilities.details:
Ra’sutekh summons an Obelisk at a target location for a duration (max 3 Obelisks). Obelisks fires a solar beam at nearby enemies, dealing minor [ap]magical damage[/] (scaling with [ap]magical power[/]) and reducing their [mr]magical resistance[/] for a few seconds.

Obelisks have their own health bar and can be destroyed by enemies.

abilities.name: Solar Flare
abilities.details:
Ra’sutekh commands his Obelisks to fire a flare of light toward a target location. Upon impact, each light deals [ap]magical damage[/] (scaling with [ap]magical power[/]) and [db]slow[/] all enemies hit.

Enemy hits by subsequent flares take reduced damage. If Ra’sutekh has no Obelisks active, he instead fires a single flare from his staff at half the range.

abilities.name: Blinded by the Sun
abilities.details:
Ra’sutekh raises his staff, channeling the full intensity of the sun's core. After a short delay, each Obelisk radiates a burst of light that deals [ap]magical damage[/] (scaling with [ap]magical power[/]) and briefly [db]blind[/] all nearby enemies.

For the next few seconds, Ra’sutekh's Obelisks become [bf]invulnerable[/] and gain increased [bf]attack speed.
